text:
If one refers to "pageContext" inside a TagSupport class declaration (before 
the constructor is executed), it will return null.

If, however, one refers to pageContext inside doStartTag() it will be non-null.

This used to work in Tomcat 3.2.3.

JSP 2.2 specification doesn't seem to discuss the lifetime of pageContext.
creator: cowwoc@bbs.darktech.org

text:
The value of pageContext is undefined until Tag.setPageContext has been 
called.  In fact, you can't even portably rely on the constructor being called.
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
